EmailTemplate.name: NDCe.05-05-21 BNK NDCe Email 5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Video: Account Opening at the ATM with Instant Card Issuance
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consumers are shifting their expectations from self-service to self-directed. They may start a transaction unaccompanied, and then request assistance from one of your bankers when the need arises. And now, those transactions don’t have to include just the basics. From issuing new cards to opening accounts, next-generation enterprise software means your ATMs can truly be a branch in a box. See it in action—watch our videos. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
